options.content: + Connect my data

---
### **Connect your own data**

Using the Grafana Cloud Infinity Plugin, you can import and visualize data from JSON, CSV, XML, GraphQL, and HTML endpoints. 

Click the **+ Connect my data** button below to get started!
+ Connect my data

### **Create an Alert for Temperature**

Using the Grafana Cloud Alerting, you can set up alerts to monitor temperature and get notified when it crosses a certain threshold.

Open the context menu (`â®`) on the panel to the left and select _More_ -> _New alert rule_ to get started

title: Overview [Celsius]
